Useful Web Service

teamFBO.com:

Crowd Source New Business Opportunities Deployed March 2014

The Problem

Evaluate Federal Business Opportunities that match your company's areas of expertise.

Challenges

  1. Too much information: Over 2000 new business opportunities per day
  2. Limited business development resources
  3. How to capitalize on your teams knowledge diversity
  4. How do you train BD newbies on what opportunities to pursue and reject?
  5. fbo.gov is hard to use on tablets and phones.

The Solution

  1. Scans fbo.gov 24/7 and returns opportunities that match our selection criteria
  2. Teams work together to evaluate opportunities that are best fit for your company

Benefits

Collaborative

  1. Enables team identification of new business opportunities
  2. Drives “whole team” participation
  3. Brings varied outlooks/experiences to bear on each opportunity ##Standardized
  4. Common selection criteria, setback, and solicitation type filters
  5. Minimizes the “I wonder if this is viable?” confusion
  6. Quality opportunities to start with ##Trains team on what kinds of opportunities to pursue and reject
  7. More qualified opportunities evaluated in far less time
  8. Multiple levels of review at minimal “cost” ##Platform Independent Works on smart phone, tablet, laptop, desktop
